name: Invasion: VRLAB
description:
This game is a VR game made in BUG Spring jam for 48 hours.

The aim of the game is to protect the VR First lab from the incoming monsters. There are 3 types of weapons you can use and a shield for your protection.
You can use the buttons on the shield to skip the level or slow down the time.

Gökay Aydın : Development

Emre Çiftçi : Game Design

Mirza: Game Design, Presentation

Ozan Özenir : 3D Modelling

Thanks to Göktug Demir for VR First Lab.
